channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Devastation in Gaza as Israel wages war on Hamas
item.description: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said Israel would fight with its "fingernails" if necessary after President Joe Biden's ultimatum that a major Israeli offensive in the Gazan city of Rafah would result in a shut-off of some US weapons. Follow for live updates.

item.title: Man sentenced to 27 years for stabbing 3 officers in Times Square on New Year's Eve
item.description: Trevor Bickford was sentenced to 27 years in federal prison for a "brazen" 2022 New Year's Eve knife attack that seriously injured three NYPD officers, the DOJ said.

item.title: May 9, 2024 Israel-Hamas war
item.description: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said US President Joe Biden made a mistake after the US paused sending a shipment of bombs to Israel so that they would not used in an invasion of the southern Gaza city of Rafah.

item.title: Prince Harry, Meghan arrive in Nigeria to champion the Invictus Games
item.description: Prince Harry and his wife Meghan have arrived in Nigeria to champion the Invictus Games, which he founded to aid the rehabilitation of wounded and sick servicemembers and veterans

item.title: Stormy Daniels wraps up testimony in Trump hush money trial
item.description: The testimony of adult film actress Stormy Daniels, a central figure in the criminal case against Donald Trump, wrapped on Thursday after the former president's lawyers continued their attack on her credibility.

item.title: Pope urges Italians to have babies as a measure of hope for future
item.description: Pope Francis has pressed his campaign to urge Italians to have children

item.title: Hopes fading for 44 workers still missing days after South Africa building collapse
item.description: Hopes are fading for 44 construction workers buried for days in the rubble of a building that collapsed in South Africa

item.title: 2 men charged in connection with the fatal shooting of a 1-year-old boy in New York
item.description: Dashawn Austin and Akeem Artis were two of 18 charged in a 63-count indictment for gang-related activity including multiple counts of murder and weapons charges.

item.title: Air Vanuatu files for bankruptcy protection after canceling all international flights
item.description: Air Vanuatu has filed for bankruptcy protection a day after it cancelled all international flights, stranding thousands of travelers
